column4: I'm trying to print a PDF.  I tried sudo apt-get install cups-pdf but something didn't work
systematicdub: nyet. I haven't tried this, yet.
right - sorry. that's what I want. to create a pdf :-)
you sholdn't need cups-pdf, I think support for that is already available without that package
the default gnome print dialogs often have to pdf option
and OpenOffice has it internally imiplemented
